Weil Wrecker Service, Inc was founded in 1977 with the goal of providing the best towing and recovery services available. We have over 30 years' experience in handling all types of tows and wreck and recovery situations. Our fleet includes light, medium, and heavy duty rollbacks and wreckers that are operated by professionally trained drivers. Many of our drivers are nationally certified towers through WreckMaster and TRAA, as well as HazMat trained and certified. We are open 24 hours a day, seven days a week, with a sister company in Hoover (Professional Towing Service, Inc ) to better serve your towing needs. Indoor and outdoor secure storage is available at each location, and all of our lots and warehouses are fenced and under video surveillance. Our facility in downtown Birmingham features loading docks and forklifts for load swaps or load shifts;we also have a portable loading dock for emergency on-location load service. As part of our heavy duty service, we have an air cushion recovery unit designed for rollover recoveru and a heavy-haul division, as well as a service truck that provides fuel delivery, jump starts and lock out service. Weil Wrecker Service, Inc accepts all major credit cards, cash, and company checks on approval (no personal checks, please ) as well as Comchecks, T-Checks, EFS Checks, etc. In addition, we offer net 30 corporate credit accounts pending setup and approval. For more information about our services or for pricing and account information, please call 205-251-4060.

Weil Wrecker Service, Inc was founded in 1977 with the goal of providing the best towing and recovery services available. We have over 30 years' experience in handling all types of tows and wreck and recovery situations. Our fleet includes light, medium, and heavy duty rollbacks and wreckers that are operated by professionally trained drivers. Many of our drivers are nationally certified towers through WreckMaster and TRAA, as well as HazMat trained and certified. We are open 24 hours a day, seven days a week, with a sister company in Hoover (Professional Towing Service, Inc ) to better serve your towing needs. Indoor and outdoor secure storage is available at each location, and all of our lots and warehouses are fenced and under video surveillance. Our facility in downtown Birmingham features loading docks and forklifts for load swaps or load shifts;we also have a portable loading dock for emergency on-location load service. As part of our heavy duty service, we have an air cushion recovery unit designed for rollover recoveru and a heavy-haul division, as well as a service truck that provides fuel delivery, jump starts and lock out service. Weil Wrecker Service, Inc accepts all major credit cards, cash, and company checks on approval (no personal checks, please ) as well as Comchecks, T-Checks, EFS Checks, etc. In addition, we offer net 30 corporate credit accounts pending setup and approval. For more information about our services or for pricing and account information, please call 205-251-4060.

Weil Wrecker Service, Inc was founded in 1977 with the goal of providing the best towing and recovery services available. We have over 30 years' experience in handling all types of tows and wreck and recovery situations. Our fleet includes light, medium, and heavy duty rollbacks and wreckers that are operated by professionally trained drivers. Many of our drivers are nationally certified towers through WreckMaster and TRAA, as well as HazMat trained and certified. We are open 24 hours a day, seven days a week, with a sister company in Hoover (Professional Towing Service, Inc ) to better serve your towing needs. Indoor and outdoor secure storage is available at each location, and all of our lots and warehouses are fenced and under video surveillance. Our facility in downtown Birmingham features loading docks and forklifts for load swaps or load shifts;we also have a portable loading dock for emergency on-location load service. As part of our heavy duty service, we have an air cushion recovery unit designed for rollover recoveru and a heavy-haul division, as well as a service truck that provides fuel delivery, jump starts and lock out service. Weil Wrecker Service, Inc accepts all major credit cards, cash, and company checks on approval (no personal checks, please ) as well as Comchecks, T-Checks, EFS Checks, etc. In addition, we offer net 30 corporate credit accounts pending setup and approval. For more information about our services or for pricing and account information, please call 205-251-4060.

Weil Wrecker Service, Inc was founded in 1977 with the goal of providing the best towing and recovery services available. We have over 30 years' experience in handling all types of tows and wreck and recovery situations. Our fleet includes light, medium, and heavy duty rollbacks and wreckers that are operated by professionally trained drivers. Many of our drivers are nationally certified towers through WreckMaster and TRAA, as well as HazMat trained and certified. We are open 24 hours a day, seven days a week, with a sister company in Hoover (Professional Towing Service, Inc ) to better serve your towing needs. Indoor and outdoor secure storage is available at each location, and all of our lots and warehouses are fenced and under video surveillance. Our facility in downtown Birmingham features loading docks and forklifts for load swaps or load shifts;we also have a portable loading dock for emergency on-location load service. As part of our heavy duty service, we have an air cushion recovery unit designed for rollover recoveru and a heavy-haul division, as well as a service truck that provides fuel delivery, jump starts and lock out service. Weil Wrecker Service, Inc accepts all major credit cards, cash, and company checks on approval (no personal checks, please ) as well as Comchecks, T-Checks, EFS Checks, etc. In addition, we offer net 30 corporate credit accounts pending setup and approval. For more information about our services or for pricing and account information, please call 205-251-4060.

Weil Wrecker Service, Inc was founded in 1977 with the goal of providing the best towing and recovery services available. We have over 30 years' experience in handling all types of tows and wreck and recovery situations. Our fleet includes light, medium, and heavy duty rollbacks and wreckers that are operated by professionally trained drivers. Many of our drivers are nationally certified towers through WreckMaster and TRAA, as well as HazMat trained and certified. We are open 24 hours a day, seven days a week, with a sister company in Hoover (Professional Towing Service, Inc ) to better serve your towing needs. Indoor and outdoor secure storage is available at each location, and all of our lots and warehouses are fenced and under video surveillance. Our facility in downtown Birmingham features loading docks and forklifts for load swaps or load shifts;we also have a portable loading dock for emergency on-location load service. As part of our heavy duty service, we have an air cushion recovery unit designed for rollover recoveru and a heavy-haul division, as well as a service truck that provides fuel delivery, jump starts and lock out service. Weil Wrecker Service, Inc was founded in 1977 with the goal of providing the best towing and recovery services available. We have over 30 years' experience in handling all types of tows and wreck and recovery situations. Our fleet includes light, medium, and heavy duty rollbacks and wreckers that are operated by professionally trained drivers. Many of our drivers are nationally certified towers through WreckMaster and TRAA, as well as HazMat trained and certified. Weil Wrecker Service, Inc was founded in 1977 with the goal of providing the best towing and recovery services available. We have over 30 years' experience in handling all types of tows and wreck and recovery situations. Our fleet includes light, medium, and heavy duty rollbacks and wreckers that are operated by professionally trained drivers. Many of our drivers are nationally certified towers through WreckMaster and TRAA, as well as HazMat trained and certified. We are open 24 hours a day, seven days a week, with a sister company in Hoover (Professional Towing Service, Inc ) to better serve your towing needs. Indoor and outdoor secure storage is available at each location, and all of our lots and warehouses are fenced and under video surveillance. Our facility in downtown Birmingham features loading docks and forklifts for load swaps or load shifts; we also have a portable loading dock for emergency on-location load service. As part of our heavy duty service, we have an air cushion recovery unit designed for rollover recoveru and a heavy-haul division, as well as a service truck that provides fuel delivery, jump starts and lock out service. Weil Wrecker Service, Inc accepts all major credit cards, cash, and company checks on approval (no personal checks, please ) as well as Comchecks, T-Checks, EFS Checks, etc. In addition, we offer net 30 corporate credit accounts pending setup and approval. For more information about our services or for pricing and account information, please call 205-251-4060.

Weil Wrecker Service, Inc was founded in 1977 with the goal of providing the best towing and recovery services available. We have over 30 years' experience in handling all types of tows and wreck and recovery situations. Our fleet includes light, medium, and heavy duty rollbacks and wreckers that are operated by professionally trained drivers. We are open 24 hours a day, seven days a week, with a sister company in Hoover (Professional Towing Service, Inc ) to better serve your towing needs. Indoor and outdoor secure storage is available at each location, and all of our lots and warehouses are fenced and under video surveillance. Weil Wrecker Service, Inc was founded in 1977 with the goal of providing the best towing and recovery services available. We have over 30 years' experience in handling all types of tows and wreck and recovery situations. Our fleet includes light, medium, and heavy duty rollbacks and wreckers that are operated by professionally trained drivers. Many of our drivers are nationally certified towers through WreckMaster and TRAA, as well as HazMat trained and certified. We are open 24 hours a day, seven days a week, with a sister company in Hoover (Professional Towing Service, Inc ) to better serve your towing needs. Indoor and outdoor secure storage is available at each location, and all of our lots and warehouses are fenced and under video surveillance. Weil Wrecker Service, Inc was founded in 1977 with the goal of providing the best towing and recovery services available. We have over 30 years' experience in handling all types of tows and wreck and recovery situations. Our fleet includes light, medium, and heavy duty rollbacks and wreckers that are operated by professionally trained drivers. We are open 24 hours a day, seven days a week, with a sister company in Hoover (Professional Towing Service, Inc ) to better serve your towing needs. Indoor and outdoor secure storage is available at each location, and all of our lots and warehouses are fenced and under video surveillance. Our facility in downtown Birmingham features loading docks and forklifts for load swaps or load shifts; we also have a portable loading dock for emergency on-location load service. Weil Wrecker Service, Inc was founded in 1977 with the goal of providing the best towing and recovery services available. We have over 30 years' experience in handling all types of tows and wreck and recovery situations. Our fleet includes light, medium, and heavy duty rollbacks and wreckers that are operated by professionally trained drivers. Many of our drivers are nationally certified towers through WreckMaster and TRAA, as well as HazMat trained and certified. We are open 24 hours a day, seven days a week, with a sister company in Hoover (Professional Towing Service, Inc ) to better serve your towing needs. Indoor and outdoor secure storage is available at each location, and all of our lots and warehouses are fenced and under video surveillance. Our facility in downtown Birmingham features loading docks and forklifts for load swaps or load shifts; we also have a portable loading dock for emergency on-location load service. As part of our heavy duty service, we have an air cushion recovery unit designed for rollover recoveru and a heavy-haul division, as well as a service truck that provides fuel delivery, jump starts and lock out service. Weil Wrecker Service, Inc accepts all major credit cards, cash, and company checks on approval (no personal checks, please ) as well as Comchecks, T-Checks, EFS Checks, etc. In addition, we offer net 30 corporate credit accounts pending setup and approval. For more information about our services or for pricing and account information, please call 205-251-4060.

Bennette Pool began Bennette's Motor World in March of 2004. Because the local BMW dealer had just left one month prior and the Mercedes dealer had left the year before, Bennette felt there was a need for continued quality and convenient service in the downtown area. Bennette has 25 years experience in the automotive business. He has worked for two of the largest dealerships in Birmingham, Alabama. His career started as a technician. After several years as a technician he became a Service Advisor and then a Service Manager. As you can see, Bennette has both product and technical knowledge of an automobile. His experience as a manager has allowed him the opportunity to establish a one on one relationship with his customers. Because of this, his customers know that the concerns they have are his personal concerns and he treats their needs in this manner which gives them peace of mind that their car is in the best of care. Bennette's factory trained technicians are ASC Certified, and were selected with the customer in mind for their expertise and knowledge. They have over 75 years combined experience with BMW and Mercedes. His BMW factory diagnostic equipment is state of the art and Bennette's Motor World is 1 of 6 service centers in the state of Alabama that owns this system. The Mercedes diagnostic equipment is also the latest and most updated. Bennette welcomes you to Bennette's Motor World and will make sure your needs are met by a friendly and courteous staff with the quality and knowledge required for your automotive repairs.
